nost.commands package¶

Submodules¶

nost.commands.init module¶

nost.commands.init.init(client, prefix, data)¶

Initializes time range for execution.

Parameters

  • client (object) – MQTT client for publishing messages.

  • prefix (str) – Prefix of execution topic.

  • data (object) – Request body.

Returns

Whether the operation was successful. datetime.datetime: Simulation start time. datetime.datetime: Simulation stop time.

Return type

bool

nost.commands.start module¶

nost.commands.start.start(sim, client, prefix, data, sim_start_time, sim_stop_time, internal_step)¶

Starts the execution.

Parameters

  • sim (sim.simulator.Simulator) – Simulator class for prefix.

  • client (object) – MQTT client for publishing messages.

  • prefix (str) – Prefix of execution topic.

  • data (object) – Request body.

  • sim_start_time (datetime.datetime) – Simulation start time.

  • sim_stop_time (datetime.datetime) – Simulation stop time.

  • internal_step (int) – Speed at which to run the execution class.

Returns

Whether the operation was successful.

Return type

bool

nost.commands.stop module¶

nost.commands.stop.stop(sim, client, prefix, data)¶

Stops the execution.

Parameters

  • sim (sim.simulator.Simulator) – Simulator class for prefix.

  • client (object) – MQTT client for publishing messages.

  • prefix (str) – Prefix of execution topic.

  • data (object) – Request body.

Returns

Whether the operation was successful. datetime.datetime: Simulation start time. datetime.datetime: Simulation stop time.

Return type

bool

nost.commands.test_script module¶

nost.commands.test_script.test_script(sim, client, prefix, data, sim_start_time, sim_stop_time, internal_step)¶

Starts a test script controlled execution.

Parameters

  • sim (sim.simulator.Simulator) – Simulator class for prefix.

  • client (object) – MQTT client for publishing messages.

  • prefix (str) – Prefix of execution topic.

  • data (object) – Request body.

  • sim_start_time (datetime.datetime) – Simulation start time.

  • sim_stop_time (datetime.datetime) – Simulation stop time.

  • internal_step (int) – Speed at which to run the execution class.

Returns

Whether the operation was successful. nost.observer.TestScriptObserver: Reference to TestScriptObserver.

Return type

bool

nost.commands.update module¶

nost.commands.update.update(sim, client, prefix, data)¶

Updates the execution.

Parameters

  • sim (sim.simulator.Simulator) – Simulator class for prefix.

  • client (object) – MQTT client for publishing messages.

  • prefix (str) – Prefix of execution topic.

  • data (object) – Request body.

Returns

Whether the operation was successful.

Return type

bool
